medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had 2 months of intermittent chest pain and recently developed generalized abdominal pain described as 'achy pressure' several days ago, along with nausea, vomiting, and low appetite. Symptoms worsened with deep breathing and included 2 episodes of vomiting with blood two days prior to admission.
